vb6:1.1: saḷāyatanaṃ → chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ (sya2ed) | chaṭṭhāyatanapaccayā → saḷāyatanapaccayā (si, cck, sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1)
vb6:40.1: nāmasampayuttaṃ chaṭṭhāyatanaṃ → nāmarūpasampayuttaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ (si); nāmasampayuttaṃ (sya1ed, pts-vp-pli1); nāmasampayuttaṃ saḷāyatanaṃ (sya2ed)
vb6:240.2: dvidhāpatho → dvedhāpatho (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1) | apariyogāhaṇā → apariyogāhanā (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
vb6:272.3: paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ → paṭhamajjhānaṃ (si) | pathavīkasiṇaṃ → paṭhavīkasiṇaṃ (bj, sya-all, pts-vp-pli1)
